description:
# FreeVD
Windows 10 Virtual Desktop Hotkeys and System Tray Icon

## Features:

## Hotkeys:

These are the default hotkeys, which are fully customizable.

![Screenshot](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/Marcus-L/FreeVD/master/Screenshots/Hotkeys.png)

**Navigate Desktops:**  
WIN+CTRL+Numpad

**Move Windows:**  
WIN+ALT+Numpad
WIN+ALT+LEFT or RIGHT

**Move Window & Follow:**  
WIN+CTRL+ALT+Numpad
WIN+CTRL+ALT+LEFT or RIGHT

## Window Pinning:

![Screenshot](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/Marcus-L/FreeVD/master/Screenshots/Pins.png)

**Pin/Unpin Applications:**  
WIN+ALT+A
(Pinning an application will pin all windows of that application to appear on all desktops)

**Pin/Unpin Windows:**  
WIN+ALT+W
(Pinning a window will pin only that window, not other windows from the same application)
author: Marcus Lum
